Sentencas: Gadolinium (10%)-doped ceria was successfully synthesized by using an urea-based co-precipitation method (UBHP).
Titulo: Gadolinium-doped ceria nanopowders synthesized by urea-based homogeneous co-precipitation (UBHP)

Sentencas: A single fluorite phase was obtained after a low temperature (400 degrees C) calcination treatment.
Titulo: Gadolinium-doped ceria nanopowders synthesized by urea-based homogeneous co-precipitation (UBHP)

Sentencas: The resulting powders showed grains of nanometric size with some agglomerations and an overall good sinterability.
Titulo: Gadolinium-doped ceria nanopowders synthesized by urea-based homogeneous co-precipitation (UBHP)

Sentencas: Pellets were sintered at 1300 and 1500 degrees C for 3 h. The ionic conductivity was measured by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements and a correlation between electrical properties and microstructure was revealed.
Titulo: Gadolinium-doped ceria nanopowders synthesized by urea-based homogeneous co-precipitation (UBHP)

Sentencas: The promising conductivity values showed that the synthesized powders are suitable for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) applications.
Titulo: Gadolinium-doped ceria nanopowders synthesized by urea-based homogeneous co-precipitation (UBHP)
